channel.title: [Shards] help me with run.bat
channel.description:
I done this tutorial to me shard server - [URL=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.msg3246665.html#msg3246665]port forwarding[/URL] - fixed the link
And i got stuck on last step by running server :/ it compiles ok
this is me run.bat
[code]@echo off title Darkscape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -cp bin server.Server .;.server/AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar release nogui pause exit[/code]
this is error when I run it:
[img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/3461/59225322.jpg[/img]
